overview: Everyone enjoys a lovely weekend away somewhere, but when youre young, horny, and in the company of equally cock-crazed buddies, then you can rest assured that what youre about to experience is gonna be pretty much unforgettable. And so it proves; as the likes of Anthony Evans, Scott Alexander and Dustin Fitch team up for a veritable fuck-fest that will literally blow your mind (not to mention your cock). Seriously, these gorgeous beauties dont hold back for a second, as they make the most of every moment together; feasting on every hard, throbbing inch of meat on offer, then pounding arse with the kind of energy youd expect from lads their age. All of which soon results in a tip-top blast of cum in all quarters.
title: Unforgettable Weekend
